name: Ou Blu
description:
Go on an adventure with Ou and Blu!

This is intended as a single player game, that you can control both characters, but you can play with multiple controllers also.

Ou can shoot, Blu can turn into a box. See what you can do with that :).

[notice]: Current build is just an incomplete tutorial with lots of issues. Tested with Xbox One controller

[CREDITS]:

Background music: https://gooseninja.itch.io/happy-loops "Happy Loops" by goose ninja
